title: Tokenlistooor
description: Schema for lists of tokens compatible with the Uniswap Interface

name.description: The name of the token list

timestamp.description: The timestamp of this list version; i.e. when this immutable version of the list was created

version.description: The version of the list, used in change detection

major.description: The major version of the list. Must be incremented when tokens are removed from the list or token addresses are changed.

minor.description: The minor version of the list. Must be incremented when tokens are added to the list.

patch.description: The patch version of the list. Must be incremented for any changes to the list.

tokens.description: The list of tokens included in the list

items.description: Metadata for a single token in a token list

chainId.description: The chain ID of the Ethereum network where this token is deployed

address.description: The checksummed address of the token on the specified chain ID

decimals.description: The number of decimals for the token balance

symbol.description: The symbol for the token; must be alphanumeric

logoURI.description: A URI to the token logo asset; if not set, interface will attempt to find a logo based on the token address; suggest SVG or PNG of size 64x64
A URI for the logo of the token list; prefer SVG or PNG of size 256x256
